name: BBQ Chicken Sheet Pan Pizza
description: This BBQ Chicken Sheet Pan Pizza is an easy dinner that comes together in no time. It’s perfect for a weeknight dinner or a weekend pizza night with the family. It’s a delicious combination of BBQ sauce, cheese, chicken and red onion.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into cubes
1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, or a combination)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, toss the cubed chicken with the BBQ sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper until evenly coated.
Spread the chicken onto a sheet pan and bake for 12 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine red onion, cilantro, and olive oil.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough into a 12-inch circle.
Transfer the pizza dough to a large sheet pan lined with parchment paper.
Brush the olive oil mixture over the pizza dough, leaving a 1/2-inch border around the edges.
Top with the cooked chicken and shredded cheese.
Bake for 8 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Garnish with extra cilantro, if desired.
